service.name: Couples Villa Massage Bali
service.description: Romantic couples villa massage service in Bali. Two professional therapists perform synchronized treatments in the privacy of your own villa.

mainEntity.name: Do you provide everything needed for the massage?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we provide everything - massage beds, premium oils, towels, music, and ambiance setup. You don't need to prepare anything.

mainEntity.name: Can we choose different massage styles for each person?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely! Each person can select their preferred massage style - Balinese, Swedish, deep tissue, or aromatherapy.

mainEntity.name: How much space do we need in our villa?

acceptedAnswer.text: We need approximately 4x4 meters of space for two massage beds side by side. Most villa bedrooms or living areas work perfectly.

service.name: Honeymoon Spa Bali
service.description: Luxury honeymoon spa packages in Bali. Exclusive couples treatments, romantic ambiance, and unforgettable wellness experiences for newlyweds.

offers.name: Honeymoon Bliss Package
offers.description: 90-minute romantic couples massage with flowers and champagne

offers.name: Ultimate Luxury Package
offers.description: 180-minute complete wellness journey with premium add-ons

mainEntity.name: How far in advance should we book our honeymoon spa?

acceptedAnswer.text: We recommend booking 3-7 days in advance for honeymoon packages to ensure availability and allow time for special preparations. Same-day bookings may be available.

mainEntity.name: What makes this different from a regular couples massage?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our honeymoon spa includes special romantic setup (flower petals, candles), premium refreshments, keepsake certificate, and optional photography service. It's designed specifically for celebrating newlyweds.

service.name: Post-Yoga Recovery Massage
service.description: Specialized post-yoga recovery massage in Bali. Deep stretching, flexibility work, and muscle release to enhance your yoga practice.

mainEntity.name: How soon after yoga should I book this massage?

acceptedAnswer.text: Ideally within 2-4 hours after your yoga session. This allows your body to cool down while muscles are still warm and receptive to deeper stretching.

mainEntity.name: Do your therapists understand yoga?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our therapists are trained in yoga anatomy and work regularly with yoga practitioners. They understand the physical demands of different yoga styles.

service.name: Uluwatu Surf Massage
service.description: Specialized surf recovery massage in Uluwatu. Target paddling strain, shoulder tension, and lower back relief for surfers.

mainEntity.name: How soon after surfing should I get massage?

acceptedAnswer.text: Best within 4-6 hours after your surf session, or in the evening after dawn patrol. This prevents next-day soreness and accelerates recovery.

mainEntity.name: Do you understand surf-specific injuries?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our therapists specialize in surfer's shoulder, lower back strain, and paddling muscle fatigue. We work with many surf camps in Uluwatu.

service.name: Group Spa Day Bali
service.description: Group spa day packages at your Bali villa. Simultaneous treatments for groups of 3-20+ people with professional coordination.

offers.name: Small groups (3-5 people)
offers.description: Per person pricing for groups of 3-5

offers.name: Medium groups (6-10 people)
offers.description: Per person pricing for groups of 6-10

mainEntity.name: How many therapists can you provide at once?

acceptedAnswer.text: We can provide simultaneous therapists for groups up to 20+ people. We have a large team available and coordinate logistics for group events.

mainEntity.name: Can each person choose a different massage type?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Each person can select their preferred massage style, duration, and oil preference. We accommodate individual needs within the group.

service.name: Detox Wellness Massage Bali
service.description: Lymphatic drainage and detox massage in Bali. Support body purification, reduce bloating, boost immunity with specialized techniques.

offers.name: 7-day wellness program
offers.description: 5 sessions over 7 days with dietary consultation

mainEntity.name: How does detox massage work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Detox massage uses gentle lymphatic drainage techniques to stimulate your body's natural detoxification system, helping eliminate toxins and reduce water retention.

mainEntity.name: Should I be on a cleanse program?

acceptedAnswer.text: Not required, but detox massage works best when combined with clean eating and hydration. We provide dietary recommendations to enhance results.

service.name: Luxury Villa Wellness Bali
service.description: Premium VIP wellness service at your luxury villa. Master therapists, exclusive treatments, five-star concierge spa care in Bali.

mainEntity.name: What makes this a luxury service?

acceptedAnswer.text: Master-level therapists with 10+ years experience, premium organic products, extended treatment times, personalized wellness consultation, and five-star concierge coordination.

mainEntity.name: Can I request a specific therapist?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our luxury service includes therapist selection. We'll provide profiles of our master therapists for you to choose from.

service.name: Mobile Spa Day Package Bali
service.description: Complete mobile spa day packages at your villa. Multiple treatments including massage, scrub, facial. Full wellness experience without leaving your accommodation.

offers.name: Full Spa Day
offers.description: 5 hours: massage + scrub + facial + foot treatment

mainEntity.name: How long does a spa day package take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our packages range from 3 hours (half-day) to 7 hours (ultimate wellness day). This includes treatment time, setup, and relaxation periods between services.

mainEntity.name: Can I customize the treatments?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely! Each package is customizable. You can swap treatments, adjust durations, and add extra services to create your perfect spa day.

service.name: Post-Hike Recovery Massage Bali
service.description: Specialized recovery massage after hiking Mount Batur or Mount Agung. Target leg muscles, reduce soreness, accelerate recovery from mountain trekking.

mainEntity.name: How soon after hiking should I book?

acceptedAnswer.text: Ideally within 4-6 hours after your hike, or the same evening. This helps prevent next-day muscle soreness (DOMS) and accelerates recovery.

mainEntity.name: Will this prevent next-day soreness?

acceptedAnswer.text: While we can't eliminate all soreness, post-hike massage significantly reduces DOMS by improving circulation and releasing lactic acid buildup in muscles.

service.name: Pregnancy Massage Bali
service.description: Safe prenatal massage in Bali by certified therapists. Relief for pregnancy back pain, swelling, and discomfort. All trimesters welcome with doctor approval.

mainEntity.name: Is pregnancy massage safe in all trimesters?

acceptedAnswer.text: We primarily serve 2nd and 3rd trimester. First trimester is considered with doctor approval. All our therapists are certified in prenatal massage with specialized safety training.

mainEntity.name: Do I need doctor approval?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we require confirmation that you've discussed massage with your doctor or midwife, especially if you have any high-risk conditions.

mainEntity.name: Are your therapists certified in prenatal massage?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, all therapists performing pregnancy massage have specialized prenatal certification and training in safe positioning, pressure points to avoid, and trimester-specific techniques.

implementationNotes.usage: Each page should implement all three schema types (Service, FAQ, and Breadcrumb) in separate script tags in the HTML head section.
implementationNotes.testing: Validate all schemas using Google's Rich Results Test tool before deployment.
implementationNotes.updates: Keep pricing and review counts current. Update quarterly or when significant changes occur.
implementationNotes.phoneNumber: Replace +62-XXX-XXXX-XXXX with actual business phone number before deployment.
implementationNotes.coordinates: Update latitude/longitude if business location changes.
implementationNotes.reviewCounts: Update review counts based on actual customer feedback collected.

schemaTypes.Service: Used for all service pages to display service information in search results
schemaTypes.MedicalTherapy: Used for therapeutic/medical massage services (detox, post-hike, pregnancy)
schemaTypes.FAQPage: Enables FAQ rich results in Google search, increases visibility
schemaTypes.BreadcrumbList: Shows navigation path in search results, improves UX
schemaTypes.AggregateRating: Displays star ratings in search results when reviews exist
schemaTypes.Offer: Shows pricing information in search results, improves click-through

richResultsExpected.faqRichResults: FAQ sections will show expanded in search results
richResultsExpected.pricingInformation: Prices may show in search snippets
richResultsExpected.starRatings: Review stars will appear in search results
richResultsExpected.breadcrumbs: Navigation path shows below page title in search
richResultsExpected.sitelinks: May generate sitelinks for popular pages over time
